Traits.Name: Far Sight
Traits.Description: Increase range from height advantage by an additional +1 for each level of height.

Traits.Name: Shoot Down
Traits.Description: The blocker's attacks gain +1 boon and bonus damage against the priority threat if they are on a higher elevation than the blocker.

Actions.Name: Create Blockade
Actions.Description: Summon a height 1 piece of terrain in an unoccupied space in range 5.
